container.paragraph: Items with a unique id can be retrieved using the item("uniqueId") function, items whose ids are not unique must be retrieved with the items("duplicatedId") function instead.

container.classes: ui bottom attached sphinx-tab tab segment code-tab sphinx-data-tab-Qysr active

container.literal_block:
# Create an Annotator instance. annotator = Annotator()
# Pass the model to the annotator and build the index. annotator.buildModelIndex(model)
duplicatedIdItems = annotator.items("duplicatedId") # The duplicateIdItems is a vector of items with "duplicatedId" # as an id attribute.
